settings.restart_the_app_for_changes_to_take_effe: Restart the app for changes to take effect.
settings.are_you_sure_you_want_to_import_this_con: Are you sure you want to import this config?
settings.the_app_will_restart_to_load_the_new_con: The app will be restarted to load the new config.
settings.there_was_an_error_saving_the_config: There was an error saving the config.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Choose a color scheme for the interface.

window_opacity.label: Window Opacity
window_opacity.description: Adjust the window opacity. (This setting is ignored if 'None' is selected for window effect.)

use_system_title_bar.label: Use System Title Bar
use_system_title_bar.description: Use the default system title bar instead of a custom one.

log_levels.label: Log Levels
log_levels.description: Select the log levels to record.

max_log_files.label: Max Log Files
max_log_files.description: Set the maximum number of log files to retain.

import_export.label: Import/Export Settings
import_export.description: Import or export settings your settings from/to a JSON file.

save_window_status.label: Save Window Status
save_window_status.description: Save window size, position, and state.

update.failed_to_check_for_updates: Failed to check for updates. Please try again later.
update.failed_to_download_update: Failed to download update. Please try again later.
update.need_admin_privileges: Administration privileges are needed to update the application.

DoLuaChecksum.description: If set, clients whose game files don't match the server's file will be kicked

KickFastPlayers.description: If enabled, players that appear to be moving faster than is possible will be kicked. May be buggy - use with caution

BackupsCount.description: Sets the number of backups to keep at once

BackupsOnVersionChange.description: Take backups on server version change

DiscordEnable.description: If enabled, allows global text chat integration with a Discord channel. Requires a valid bot token to be set under "Discord Token"

DiscordToken.description: Sets the bot token to access the Discord servers

DiscordChannel.description: Sets the name of the Discord channel to integrate with. Use "Discord ID" if this does not work

DiscordChannelID.description: Sets the ID of the Discord channel to integrate with. Use this if "Discord Channel" does not work

Faction.description: If enabled, factions can be created and used

FactionDaySurvivedToCreate.description: Number of in-game days that a player must survive for before they can create a faction

FactionPlayersRequiredForTag.description: Sets the number of players required as faction members before the faction owner can create a group tag

AllowDestructionBySledgehammer.description: Allow players to destroy world objects with sledgehammers

BloodSplatLifespanDays.description: Sets the number of days before old blood splats are removed. Removal happens when map chunks are loaded.

CarEngineAttractionModifier.description: Modifies the range of zombie attraction to cars. Lower values can help lag

ConstructionPreventsLootRespawn.description: If enabled, items will not respawn in buildings that players have barricaded or built in

FastForwardMultiplier.description: Sets how fast time passes while players sleep

HidePlayersBehindYou.description: If enabled, players that can't be seen will be automatically hidden (like zombies)

HoursForLootRespawn.description: Sets the in-game hours after which all containers that have been looted at least once will respawn loot. Loot respawn is not impacted by visibility or subsequent looting

ItemNumbersLimitPerContainer.description: Sets the maximum number of items that can be placed in a container. Includes individual small items like nails

KnockedDownAllowed.description: If set, players can be knocked down

MaxItemsForLootRespawn.description: Sets the maximum number of items that containers can hold to be allowed to respawn. If the number of items is less than or equal to the number set, loot will respawn

MinutesPerPage.description: Sets the number of in-game minutes it takes to read one page of a book

NoFire.description: If enabled, fires are not allowed (except campfires)

PlayerBumpPlayer.description: If enabled, players will bump (and knock over) other players when running through them

PlayerRespawnWithOther.display_name: Enable Player Respawn At Other's Location
PlayerRespawnWithOther.description: If set, players will be allowed to respawn in-game at a split screen / Remote Play player's location

PlayerRespawnWithSelf.display_name: Enable Player Respawn At Death Coordinates
PlayerRespawnWithSelf.description: If set, players will be able to respawn in-game at the coordinates where they died

RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval.display_name: Remove Player Corpses On Corpse Removal
RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval.description: If enabled, when 'HoursForCorpseRemoval' triggers, it will also remove player’s corpses from the ground

SledgehammerOnlyInSafehouse.description: If enabled, players can destroy world objects with sledgehammers only in their safehouse

SleepAllowed.description: If enabled, players are allowed to sleep when tired, but do not need to

SleepNeeded.description: If enabled, players become tired and need to sleep

SneakModeHideFromOtherPlayers.display_name: Hide From Other Players In Sneak Mode
SneakModeHideFromOtherPlayers.description: If set, players in sneak mode will be hidden from other players

SpeedLimit.description: Sets the speed limit for players

TrashDeleteAll.description: If enabled, players can use the 'delete all' button on bins

AllowNonAsciiUsername.description: Allow use of non-ASCII (cyrillic etc) characters in usernames

AnnounceDeath.description: If enabled, a global message is displayed in the chat when a player dies

BanKickGlobalSound.description: If set, enables the global sound for ban and kick messages

ClientActionLogs.description: Semicolon-separated list of actions that will be written to the ClientActionLogs.txt server log

ClientCommandFilter.description: Semicolon-separated list of commands that will not be written to the cmd.txt server log

DefaultPort.description: Default starting port for player data. If UDP, this is this one of two ports used.

DenyLoginOnOverloadedServer.description: If set, login will be denied on an overloaded server

Map.description: Semi-colon separated list of maps to load on the server

MapRemotePlayerVisibility.description: Controls the display of remote players on the in-game map

MaxPlayers.description: Maximum number of players that can be on the server at one time. This excludes admins.

Mods.description: Semi-colon separated list of mod IDs

Open.description: If enabled, players may join the server without already being included in the whitelist. Otherwise, admins must manually create username/password combinations

PauseEmpty.description: If enabled, game time stops when there are no players online

PerkLogs.description: If enabled, changes in player perk levels will be tracked in the PerkLog.txt server log

Public.description: If enabled, the server will be visible in the in-game browser (Steam-enabled servers are always visible in the Steam server browser)

PublicDescription.description: Sets the description displayed in the in-game browser

PublicName.description: Sets the server name as shown in the in-game browser and, if applicable, the Steam browser

SaveWorldEveryMinutes.description: Sets the real-world time between each automatic save of loaded parts of the map. (The map is usually saved only after clients leave a loaded area)

SpawnItems.description: Comma-separated list of item types that new players spawn with

SpawnPoint.description: Sets the spawn point for every new player. See https://map.projectzomboid.com for coordinates

UPnP.description: If enabled, the server will attempt to configure automatic port forwarding on a compatible router

WorkshopItems.description: Semi-colon separated list of IDs of workshop items to install.

ServerWelcomeMessage.description: Sets the first welcome message visible in the chat panel, which is displayed immediately after player login.

ResetID.description: Reset ID determines if the server has undergone a soft-reset. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. Used in conjunction with PlayerServerID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere

ServerPlayerID.description: ServerPlayerID determines if a character is from another server, or single player. This value may be changed by soft resets. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. This is used in conjunction with ResetID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere

PVP.description: If enabled, players can hurt and kill other players

PVPFirearmDamageModifier.description: Sets the damage multiplier for PvP ranged attacks

PVPMeleeDamageModifier.description: Sets the damage multiplier for PvP melee attacks

PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction.display_name: Enable PvP Melee While Hit Reaction
PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction.description: If enabled, players can hit again when struck by another player

SafetyCooldownTimer.description: Sets the delay before a player can enter or leave PvP mode again, having recently done so

SafetySystem.description: If enabled, allows players to enter and leave PvP mode on an individual basis. A player can only hurt another player when at least one of them is in PvP mode. Requires "Allow PvP" to be enabled

SafetyToggleTimer.description: Sets the time taken for a player to enter and leave PvP mode

ShowSafety.description: If enabled, displays a skull icon above the heads of players who have entered PvP mode

AutoCreateUserInWhiteList.description: Automatically add unknown usernames to the whitelist when players join (for open servers). Players will supply their own username/password on joining

DisplayUserName.description: Displays players' usernames above their heads in-game

DropOffWhiteListAfterDeath.description: If set, player accounts will be removed from the whitelist after death. This prevents players creating a new character after death on non-open servers

LoginQueueConnectTimeout.description: Sets the connection timeout for the login queue

LoginQueueEnabled.description: If set, the login queue will be enabled

MaxAccountsPerUser.description: Sets the limit on the number of different accounts a single Steam user may create on the server

MouseOverToSeeDisplayName.display_name: Require Mouse Over To See Display Name
MouseOverToSeeDisplayName.description: If enabled, players will have to mouse over someone to see their display name

PingLimit.description: Sets the ping limit before a player is kicked from the server

ShowFirstAndLastName.description: If enabled, displays players' first and last names above their heads in-game instead of usernames

SteamScoreboard.description: Sets whether steam usernames and avatars are visible in the player list

AdminSafehouse.description: If enabled, only admins can claim safehouses

DisableSafehouseWhenPlayerConnected.description: If set, disables a safehouse when a member of the safehouse is connected, so that it acts like a normal house and is only secure when players are offline

PlayerSafehouse.description: If enabled, both admins and players can claim safehouses

SafeHouseRemovalTime.description: Players are automatically removed from a safehouse they have not visited for this many real-world hours

SafehouseAllowFire.description: If enabled, safehouses can be damaged by fire

SafehouseAllowLoot.description: If enabled, non-members can loot safehouses

SafehouseAllowNonResidential.description: If enabled, players can claim non-residential buildings

SafehouseAllowRespawn.description: If enabled, players will respawn in a safehouse they were a member of before death

SafehouseAllowTrepass.description: If enabled, non-members can enter a safehouse without being invited

SafehouseDaySurvivedToClaim.description: Sets the number of in-game days that a player must survive for before they can claim a safehouse

ChatStreams.description: Sets the enabled chat streams for different message targets. Options: s (say), r (radio), a (all), w (whisper), y (yell), sh (safehouse), f (faction), all

DisableRadioAdmin.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'admin' access level

DisableRadioGM.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'gm' access level

DisableRadioInvisible.description: Disables radio transmissions from invisible players

DisableRadioModerator.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'moderator' access level

DisableRadioOverseer.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'overseer' access level

DisableRadioStaff.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with an access level

GlobalChat.description: If enabled, players can communicate with everyone (using the /all command in chat)

Voice3D.description: If set, enables directional audio for VOIP

VoiceEnable.description: If set, VOIP will be enabled

VoiceMaxDistance.description: Sets the maximum tile distance over which VOIP sounds can be heard

VoiceMinDistance.description: Sets the minimum tile distance over which VOIP sounds can be heard
